recipe.title: Throw-it-together Self-crusting Pie
recipe.subtitle: This is one of those seemingly impossibly easy quiche thingies I throw it all in together. A great recipe when you're in a hurry.
recipe.ingredients: 4 eggs, beaten 1 1/2 C grated Cheese 1 small onion, peeled and chopped 6 rashers bacon, chopped 1 1/2 C self-raising Flour 1 1/2 C milk 1/4 C chopped parsley salt and pepper 2 C of any of the following: mushrooms peppers cherry tomatoes courgettes corn peas beans pumpkin
recipe.steps: Preheat oven to 180°C. Spray a medium to large sized lasagne dish with non-stick baking spray. Mix all the ingredients in a bowl. Pour into the prepared dish and bake for 40—45 minutes until set and golden brown.
